content.rendered:
Directed by Vishal Mishra.

Written by Vishal Mishra.

Cast Kunaal Roy Kapur(Marudhar Pandey (as Kunal Roy Kapur)). Tara-Alisha Berry(Chitra). Rajesh Sharma(Ashok Pandey). Gaurav Dixit(Sunder). Saurabh Awasthi(Kapil). Neetu Pandey(Sarla). Deepika Amin((as Deepika Ameen)). Seema Deo(Neeta). Ramesh Deo(Neeta’s Husband) . Amit Kumar Bhagat(Side Role)

Language Hindi.

Producers Shantanu Chaturvedi. Pramod Gore. Raj Kushwaha. Arvind Rajpurohit. Manan Sampat. Ishwar Singh. Ravinder Thakur.

Production Artha Motion Pictures. Raywings Entertainment. Vikrant Studio.
